sections.comments: This asynchronous online lecture does not have a scheduled meeting time.

This asynchronous online lecturer does not have a scheduled meeting time.This section of the course is ONLINE- distance education. Your instructor and course support staff will contact you by email prior to and during the course. Please ensure you have a valid email account through Interchange/Netinfo.  You will need your Campus Wide Login (CWL) to login to your course at https://www.elearning.ubc.ca/ . Course materials must be ordered or picked up at the UBC Bookstore. For more information, check the Learner's Guide for distance education at : http://ctlt.ubc.ca/Where applicable, please visit this site for examination information: http://www.students.ubc.ca/coursesreg/exams/
Note:  This is a wait list for GEOG 350, section 101, Term 1. You will be moved into active registration if space becomes available. Wait list does not guarantee placement in this course.

Note:  This is a wait list for GEOG 350, section 99C, Term C (Distance Education). You will be moved into active registration if space becomes available. Wait list does not guarantee placement in this course.

description: City systems and theories of urban location; internal spatial structure of the city; commercial and industrial location; social areas; neighbourhood and land use change; urban trends and public policy.
